Colombia: Approximated date of painting of the Sopo Archangels
Sweden: The colony of the Swedish Gold Coast is established on the Gulf of Guinea in present-day Ghana.
Tonga: Mataelehaʻamea, the Tu'i Kanokupolu, established the supremacy of his dynasty after a war against the Tuʻi Haʻatakalaua, Vaea.
USA: Nicholas Easton was elected president of Rhode Island.
Dudley was elected governor of the Massachusetts Bay Colony.
The Treaty of Hartford, under which New Netherland ceded its claims in the valley of the Connecticut River and fixed its border with Connecticut on Long Island, was signed.
